title: Team Page - Manager Challenge
custom_preconds:
Given there is a game "In Progress"
And the user has navigated to one of the team's participating
custom_steps: When there is a Manager Challenge
custom_expected: Then the Manager Challenge will be reflected properly under the linescore as "<team_abbrev> Challenge"

title: Team Page - Umpire Review
custom_preconds:
Given there is a game "In Progress"
And the user has navigated to one of the team's participating
custom_steps: When there is an Umpire Review
custom_expected: Then the Umpire Review will be reflected properly under the linescore as "Umpire Review"

custom_steps: When there is a Manager Challenge
custom_expected: Then the Manager Challenge will be reflected properly on the Scoreboard cell as  "<team_abbrev> Challenge"
